mapper.insert: insert into board (userNo, boardTitle, boardContents, boardClass, regDate) values (#{userNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{boardClass}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'))
mapper.select: select case when max(boardNo) > 0 then max(boardNo) else 1 end as boardNo from board
select * from board where userNo = #{userNo} and boardNo = #{boardNo}
